data.name: 103 - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Listen to the full original soundtrack for 103.
A mixture of weird and wonderful sounds taking you on a journey through Lily's thoughts.
(Soundtrack does not contain music from the trailer)

Track list:

  • Just a dream
  • Wake up
  • A note to one
  • Endless
  • Never alone
  • A curious corner
  • Don't be late
  • Keep reading
  • Have a drink
  • Look at yourself
  • Arrival
  • Follow the crowd
  • Broken perception
  • Fatal decision
  • The aftermath
  • Shadow of life
  • Pointless escape
  • A clear end

All files are .mp3 at 256kbps
